channel.title: Nathanael Kenzler Portfolio Updates
channel.description: New projects and blog posts from my personal portfolio.

item.title: Blog: Mastering New Skills – Marketing Research at UArizona
item.description: A snapshot of the tools, research methods, and analytical skills I’m beginning to develop as I start my master’s coursework at the University of Arizona.

item.title: Blog: Building This Site – Bringing My Creative Side Into Marketing
item.description: My first post explaining why I built this website, how I approached it as a project, and what I want it to become over time.

item.title: Project: Capstone – Business Strategy Game
item.description: Senior-year capstone project simulating a competitive business environment, focused on strategic decision-making, execution, and performance improvement.

item.title: Project: Professional Persona Analysis
item.description: Junior-year project analyzing self-perception versus peer perception through survey research, data synthesis, and insight development.

item.title: Project: Case Competition Presentation
item.description: Junior-year case competition project presented through Insight, emphasizing research, strategic thinking, and clear communication of recommendations.
